description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Catch the lights falling from the sky to light up your lamp! Get special color combos to get more points and go for the high score. Play cooperatively with a friend or duke it out to get the most points.
description.short: Catch the lights falling from the sky to light up your lamp! Get special color combos to get more points and go for the high score. Play cooperatively with a friend or duke it out to get the most points.
